      • listOrgs

        public java.lang.Object[] listOrgs(User loggedInUser)
        Lists all organizations trusted by the user's organization.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        Returns:
        Returns array of channels with info such as channel_label, channel_name, channel_parent_label, packages and systems.

      • listChannelsProvided

        public java.lang.Object[] listChannelsProvided(User loggedInUser,
                                               java.lang.Integer trustOrgId)
        Lists all software channels that organization given is providing to the user's organization.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        trustOrgId - organization id of the trusted org
        Returns:
        Returns array of channels with info such as channel_label, channel_name, channel_parent_label, packages and systems.

      • addTrust

        public int addTrust(User loggedInUser,
                    java.lang.Integer orgId,
                    java.lang.Integer trustOrgId)
        Add an organization to the list of trusted organizations.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        orgId - The id of the organization to be updated.
        trustOrgId - The id of the organization to be added.
        Returns:
        1 on success, else 0.

      • removeTrust

                       java.lang.Integer orgId,
                       java.lang.Integer trustOrgId)
        Remove an organization to the list of trusted organizations.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        orgId - the id of the organization to be updated.
        trustOrgId - The id of the organization to be removed.
        Returns:

      • listSystemsAffected

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> listSystemsAffected(User loggedInUser,
                                                                                            java.lang.Integer orgId,
                                                                                            java.lang.Integer trustOrgId)
        Get a list of systems within the trusted organization that would be affected if the trust relationship was removed. This basically lists systems that are sharing at least (1) package.
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        orgId - the id of trusting organization.
        trustOrgId - The id of the trusted organization.
        Returns:
        A list of affected systems.
